experience.description: Spearheaded legacy migration and architected resilient Microservices/IoT solutions with a focus on high-performance cloud ecosystems.
achievements: Spearheaded Legacy Migration: Led the full-stack modernization of legacy PHP and Node.js monoliths to a scalable NestJS architecture.
Microservices & IoT Architecture: Designed and deployed resilient solutions with Tuya IoT integrations enabling real-time processing.
High-Performance Backend: Developed robust RESTful APIs using Node.js and PostgreSQL, optimizing schemas for high-volume traffic.
Cloud & DevOps: Orchestrated containerized deployments using Docker on AWS, ensuring 99.9% uptime and reproducible environments.
Full-Stack Implementation: Built dynamic web interfaces using React.js and Redux within the MERN/PERN stack.

projects.title: Enterprise Multi-Tenant CRM
projects.challenge: Building a scalable multi-tenant application where each tenant requires custom modules and localized features.
projects.solution: Architected a microservices-based system using React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL with regional data isolation.
projects.win: Created reusable utility functions and optimized codebases to allow seamless customization for each tenant.

projects.title: Role-Based Lead Management
projects.challenge: Fragmented communication between salespersons and leads, requiring real-time SMS and call integration.
projects.solution: Developed microservices with Twilio and Sendgrid integration. Orchestrated with Docker for reliability.
projects.win: Implemented real-time push notifications using FCM, significantly improving lead engagement response times.

projects.title: Safety Services Doc Manager
projects.challenge: Redefining safety industry standards with seamless document approval and Microsoft account integration.
projects.solution: Built a responsive React interface with Azure AD SSO and a dynamic dashboard for real-time document tracking.
projects.win: Synthesized design requirements into interactive styled components, improving client organizational efficiency.

projects.title: Healthcare Home-Testing API
projects.challenge: Coordinating complex logistics for home-based medical testing with real-time shipment tracking.
projects.solution: Developed Node.js APIs integrated with ShipEngine, ShipHero, and MyLabBox for automated order fulfillment.
projects.win: Researched and integrated multiple 3-party APIs, ensuring 100% visibility for patients throughout the testing lifecycle.

projects.title: Smart Hotel PMS Modernization
projects.challenge: Migrating a legacy monolithic PHP codebase to NestJS for real-time control of Smart TVs and HVAC.
projects.solution: Integrated Tuya IoT Platform and MQTT protocols to enable automated guest check-in room scenes.
projects.win: Architected schema migrations that improved system response time by 25% for high-frequency IoT data logging.
